postFeatureReview.summary: Implemented Key Takeaways feature: 3-bullet summary block displayed after ArticleHeader. Added Zod schema validation, React component with amber accent styling, integration in both page templates, and content for all 11 articles across GB and IE regions.
postFeatureReview.impact: Schema layer (types/schemas.ts), UI layer (new component), page templates (guides + bettor-resources), all article data files, content documentation
postFeatureReview.issues: keyTakeaways is currently optional in schema to allow incremental migration. Should be made required once confirmed all articles have content.
postFeatureReview.recommendations: 1) Remove .optional() from keyTakeaways schema to enforce 3-item requirement. 2) Consider adding keyTakeaways to article listing cards for better discoverability. 3) Monitor Google Search Console for any rich snippet improvements.
